channel.title: TragedyX
channel.description:
Hello there, welcome to TragedyX.
We stride to offer the best opportunities to dedicate a best piece of structure and knowledge on how a server should work. We offer a load of various activities and training, ranging from Godwars, Barrows and KBD to Rockcrabs, Scorpions and Spiders!
We stride to achieve the goal that will bring fun to the server, not even that! We offer one-to-one sessions with each player, every day. We also tend to update quite often, every day, every hour. It's not like what you would expect with any other server, is it?
We take account in what suggestions are posted and we are aware that what makes our players happy, will increase the percentage of more players coming to join.
So, what you waiting for! Come and log in now! Registration not required!
Donator Benefits:
- Donator Island; - Donator shops (including divines etc); - Double XP; - Donator Yell and Icon; - Better advantage of speaking too/or with a Owner for a longer period of time (1 hour max); and - Get two mystery boxes for free.
If you donate $25 or over, you will receive the following as well!
- Trusted rank along with Donator rank; - Increase any ONE skill 20% higher; and - Get another mystery box for free!
http://tragedyx.t15.org
- Great eco - Great pking - Great community - 24/7 VPS Hosted - Friendly staff - Great ways to skill/boss!

item.title: TragedyX
item.dc:creator: @sacredfight2 sacredfight2
